attributes.action: Start a petition for more pay for our nursed
attributes.additional_details: Give our front line staff more money
attributes.background: The goverment offered pittance to our nurses after all they have done and continue to do during the pandemic , the goverment are a disgraceful  the front line staff deserve to be recognised with the right pay and pay rises

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253
